column5: Wanted - one die hard pike fisherman for an outpost trip to bear lake in manitoba - bear lake is a 20+ mile long outpost from utik lake lodge. one of our guys has family medical issues and cannot come - August 4-12th - Only pike fanatics need apply!!! Thanks!!! If an outpost isnt your thing right now we are planning on going into knee lake with just the 3 of us - would prefer bear lake however we are flexible!
Try the Share a seat forum too! I've had pretty good luck putting trips together and making new friends too! Good luck!
